name: 聊一聊我们的技术
body:
![](http://image.baidu.com/search/detail?ct=503316480&z=0&ipn=d&word=%E8%A5%BF%E6%B9%96%E7%BE%8E%E6%99%AF&step_word=&pn=1&spn=0&di=105320123700&pi=&rn=1&tn=baiduimagedetail&is=&istype=0&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&in=&cl=2&lm=-1&st=undefined&cs=1213316742%2C255539954&os=3747555797%2C3109438550&simid=3431744960%2C250442549&adpicid=0&ln=1000&fr=&fmq=1459818261435_R&fm=&ic=undefined&s=undefined&se=&sme=&tab=0&width=&height=&face=undefined&ist=&jit=&cg=&bdtype=0&oriquery=&objurl=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.pconline.com.cn%2Fimages%2Fupload%2Fupc%2Ftx%2Fitbbs%2F1205%2F25%2Fc3%2F11753627_1337932135068_5_1024x1024it.jpg&![](http://image.baidu.com/search/detail?ct=503316480&z=0&ipn=d&word=%E8%A5%BF%E6%B9%96%E7%BE%8E%E6%99%AF&step_word=&pn=4&spn=0&di=4676499300&pi=&rn=1&tn=baiduimagedetail&is=&istype=0&ie=utf-8&oe=utf-8&in=&cl=2&lm=-1&st=undefined&cs=2935350607%2C2214210148&os=2414369485%2C1365016565&simid=4125237301%2C788887786&adpicid=0&ln=1000&fr=&fmq=1459818261435_R&fm=&ic=undefined&s=undefined&se=&sme=&tab=0&width=&height=&face=undefined&ist=&jit=&cg=&bdtype=0&oriquery=&objurl=http%3A%2F%2Fimg.pconline.com.cn%2Fimages%2Fupload%2Fupc%2Ftx%2Fphotoblog%2F1108%2F24%2Fc5%2F8752571_8752571_1314165724203.jpg&fromurl=ippr_z2C%24qAzdH3FAzdH3F1r_z%26e3Brv5gstgj_z%26e3Bv54_z%26e3BvgAzdH3F1ri5p5AzdH3Fd8m8dbn_z%26e3Bip4s&gsm=0)fromurl=ippr_z2C%24qAzdH3FAzdH3F2_z%26e3Brv5gstgj_z%26e3Bv54_z%26e3BvgAzdH3FkkfAzdH3Fp5rtv-8cndn0c9_z%26e3Bip4s&gsm=0)我不会用， 从来没用过这玩意。
# 装这个环境装了好半天， 都快气死我了， 在我要放弃的时候， 它终于被我搞好了
## 接下来我就开始试着写自己的第一篇博客了，就这样吧，无论如何， 也算迈出了一小步
### 对了， 忘了介绍， 我叫陈冬，92年的
